scripts.firebase: npm run default && firebase emulators:start --import test/.seed
scripts.deploy: npm run default && DEPLOY_TARGET=staging npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run default && DEPLOY_TARGET=staging npm run build && firebase deploy --only=hosting
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run prod && DEPLOY_TARGET=production npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:prod:functions: npm run prod && DEPLOY_TARGET=production firebase deploy --only=functions
scripts.deploy:prod:hosting: npm run prod && DEPLOY_TARGET=production npm run build && firebase deploy --only=hosting
scripts.reinstall: rm package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && npm i
